content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

Does your small business along Nepean Highway in Cheltenham need more customers? Or does your already successful business at Taunton Drive need a digital facelift? Whatever business you’re in, Confetti Design’s got your back. We are a web design company in Australia that delivers spectacular websites, and we can sure do the same for your business.

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Cheltenham

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563840190678{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

From designing your ecommerce website in Cheltenham to developing a brand that sells, we have all your web design service needs to help you succeed in your business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563758553333{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

4 Reasons for choosing Confetti Design to take care of your graphic designs

[vc_column_text]

When a small business is starting up, just like when you’re just starting your Cheltenham business, it is normal that business owners will be frugal when it comes to costs. This should not be the case when you decide to present your business online. It is tempting to use free tools or even buy from cheap online sites who have ready-made logos, collaterals, and graphics for your Cheltenham business website, but it can actually do more damage to your business. Here are the reasons that you should choose Confetti Design to take care of the graphics need of your website.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

The role of graphic design for fruitful marketing and effective branding is extremely vital. Don’t fall to the trap of mediocracy when it comes to your graphics whether for your physical store in Cheltenham or for your ecommerce website design. Confetti Design’s services include all your graphic design needs, even your printable collateral. Contact us today to learn more about what we can offer.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608564696{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564532168463{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Our graphic designers are creative experts

We collaborate with our graphic designers to accurately describe what your business does, and in turn they will perform best approaches in designing so your customised logo and graphics will speak to your potential customers. Confetti Design graphic designers have years of experience and continuously researches on the latest trends on designs, so you know that your Cheltenham business is represented accurately through your website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608572404{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564532196423{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

You need to impress your web visitors

When you acquire visitors to your website, the visuals of your home page – logo, graphics, icons—will be the first thing they will see even before they get to read whatever content about your Cheltenham business your website has. You don’t want to put generic graphics in there, you want those to be on point in representing your business. Confetti Design doesn’t only take care of the excellent graphics of your Cheltenham business website. We also make sure they are strategically situated in areas that your clients will immediately see, so that they browse your website longer.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608578524{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564532214168{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

You need consistency

When you hire a graphic designer to take care of your business website’s graphics, you can be assured of the consistency of the designs. It means that every graphic in your website speaks of one language, which is your brand. Confetti Design is a small business website design company who believes that this is an important aspect when it comes to branding your business in Cheltenham, and you can be sure that we keep that in mind when we collaborate with our graphic designers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608585353{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_04aaa.jpg?id=11317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564532236223{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

It’s cost effective

Compared to paid websites that auto generate your logo, graphic designers of Confetti Design will customize your graphics according to your standards. This means that with Confetti design’s affordable web design services, you don’t have to spend time looking for the perfect design yourself because we will custom made it for you. At the same time, you can be assured that your graphics will stand out among your competitors in Cheltenham—and all you had to do to have these is to tell us what you want.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563758541400{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563758527069{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564532354344{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Cheltenham, Hampton, Moorabbin, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563758514770{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
